item.title: Deploy a pkgdown on gh-pages
item.description: There are three ways to deploy a website on your GitHub pages : using the gh-pages; using the folder docs on your master branch; using the master branch. I frequently use the GitHub pages to deploy the pkgdown websites I create for my R packages. For a while, I was using the docs/ folder where the website is generated by default.
